title: Package meta-information
description: The schema of package meta information

package.title: Package
package.description: The package unique identifier in URI form which points to current version of package file

name.title: Name
name.description: The original name of the package

version.title: Version
version.description: The package version in a format it was originally specified

description.title: Description
description.description: The textual description of the package

url.title: URL
url.description: The package homepage (website, online documentation or repository)
